jd: Dear Consultant,I hope you're doing well!My name is Rahat and I am working as a Talent Acquisition at Panzer Solutions LLC.We deal with US IT and non-IT recruitment services. We have the below opening with our preferred client,Let me know if you are available & interested in this position. If interested please share a copy of your resume and best time, number to reach.Role :- Business AnalystLocation:- Austin, TX, Remote RoleContract:- 3+ MONTHSJob Description Candidates Must be Local to Texas Only AND Texas Medicaid must requiredMinimum Requirements:Candidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements (skills/experience) will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunity.YearsRequired/PreferredExperience5RequiredExperience as a Business Analyst.5RequiredExperience with Texas Medicaid systems.8PreferredExperience working with Information Technology projects.8PreferredKnowledge of software development processes and practices.5PreferredExperience with and Agile delivery approach.
